mapper.insert: INSERT INTO audio.utterance (id, note, standard_form, dialect_form, form, speaker_no, start, finish, metadata_id) VALUES(#{id}, #{note}, #{standard_form}, #{dialect_form}, #{form}, #{speaker_no}, #{start}, #{finish}, #{metadata_id});
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.note, u.standard_form, u.dialect_form, u.form, u.speaker_no, u.start, u.finish, count(standard) eojeol_count FROM audio.utterance u, audio.eojeollist e WHERE u.metadata_id = #{value} and u.id = e.utterance_id group by u.id ORDER BY u.start;
